info.author: Intelimetrica team
info.description:
**coati** is a tool that provides a fast, simple and highly customizable  way to programmatically
generate PowerPoint presentations.
coati works using a base PowerPoint template and can replicate and fill the slides with the desire
information.

Currently coati supports four types of inputs:

 - Excel charts
 - Images (png, svg, jpg)
 - Excel tables
 - Text
info.name: coati
info.summary: A tool for programmatically generating PowerPoint reports.
info.html_description:
coati is a tool that provides a fast, simple and highly customizable way to programmatically generate PowerPoint presentations. coati works using a base PowerPoint template and can replicate and fill the slides with the desire information.

Currently coati supports four types of inputs:

  • Excel charts
  • Images (png, svg, jpg)
  • Excel tables
  • Text
